markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Debilitating Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=399) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 150 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Aiming for a weak point, you impede your foe with a precise shot. Make a ranged weapon Strike. If it hits and deals damage, the target is [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) until the end of its next turn.
name: Debilitating Shot
